xgw@redmatrix.com.cn
 
From: Electronics Editorial Office
Date: 2025-09-04 13:52
To: Guangwei Xie
CC: Apinya Obma
Subject: Congratulations on Your Accepted Paper & Empower Your Research with SciProfiles
Dear Dr. Xie,
 
Congratulations on your recent publication in Electronics! Once it is
officially published, it will be automatically added to your SciProfiles
profile
(https://sciprofiles.com/profile/4630795?utm_source=SuSy&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=promotion).
 
To help you make the most of this milestone, we suggest:
 
1. Take a few minutes to update your profile, so your academic achievements
are always presented in the most complete and up-to-date way to the global
research community.
2. Share a post to highlight your latest research updates on SciProfiles.
This can significantly increase your workâ€™s visibility compared with those
who donâ€™t share.
3. Discover and connect with over 1M researchers on SciProfiles to explore
potential collaborations and expand your academic network.
 
Weâ€™re also running a 3-minute survey to better understand how we can
support your research visibility, collaboration, and career growth. Your
feedback will directly guide new features on SciProfiles.
 
As a token of appreciation, SciProfiles and MDPIâ€™s Encyclopedia offer an
Academic Video Service (https://encyclopedia.pub/video_service) benefit for
completing the survey. This service transforms your publication into
engaging, shareable videos to reach a wider audience and boost visibility.
Through a random draw, 3 participants will receive a free video, and 50
participants will get a buy-one-get-one-free offer.
 
Start the survey here: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/6CTFX3Y
 
SciProfiles is always here to support you throughout your research journey.
If you have any questions, feel free to visit our Help Center
(https://sciprofiles.com/help-center) or contact us at info@sciprofiles.com.
 
Best regards,
SciProfiles Team

email_data.subject: Re: Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering - Manuscript ID FITEE-2025-0035
email_data.text_content:
---- Replied Message ----
| From | Ziyang Zhai<onbehalfof@manuscriptcentral.com> |
| Date | 9/14/2025 13:11 |
| To | <luomingyu2002@126.com> |
| Subject | Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering - Manuscript ID FITEE-2025-0035 |
14-Sep-2025

Dear Dr. LUO:

Your manuscript entitled "Challenges and Methods of Vulnerability Mining Oriented to Endogenous Security Defense" has been successfully submitted online and is presently being given full consideration for publication in the Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering.

Your manuscript ID is FITEE-2025-0035.

Please mention the above manuscript ID in all future correspondence or when calling the office for questions. If there are any changes in your street address or e-mail address, please log in to ScholarOne Manuscripts at https://mc03.manuscriptcentral.com/fitee and edit your user information as appropriate.

You can also view the status of your manuscript at any time by checking your Author Center after logging in to https://mc03.manuscriptcentral.com/fitee.

Thank you for submitting your manuscript to the Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering.

Sincerely,
Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering Editorial Office

---- Replied Message ----
| From | Ziyang Zhai<onbehalfof@manuscriptcentral.com> |
| Date | 9/14/2025 20:21 |
| To | <luomingyu2002@126.com> |
| Subject | Title page does not satisfy the requirements - FITEE-2025-0035 |
Dear Dr. Luo,

Thanks for submitting to FITEE.

The title page does not satisfy the requirements, however; it needs to include the following information: article title, author names, author affiliations, email, abstract and key words, fund info (if any), corresponding author, author contribution statement, conflict of interest, and author bio.

You are expected to send an updated version of the title page to jzus_zzy@zju.edu.cn ASAP.


Sincerely,
Editorial Office of
Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering
2025.9.14

| From | Ziyang Zhai |
| Date | 9/14/2025 20:21 |
| To |  |
| Subject | Title page does not satisfy the requirements - FITEE-2025-0035 |
Dear Dr. Luo,

Thanks for submitting to FITEE.

The title page does not satisfy the requirements, however; it needs to include the following information: article title, author names, author affiliations, email, abstract and key words, fund info (if any), corresponding author, author contribution statement, conflict of interest, and author bio.

You are expected to send an updated version of the title page to jzus_zzy@zju.edu.cn ASAP.

Sincerely,
Editorial Office of
Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering
2025.9.14

Dear Editorial Office of Frontiers of Information Technology & Electronic Engineering,

Thank you for your email regarding the title page requirements for FITEE-2025-0035.

I have prepared the updated title page, which includes the article title, author names, author affiliations, email, abstract, keywords, funding information, corresponding author, author contribution statement, conflict of interest statement, and author bio. The updated title page is included in the attachment for your review.

Please let me know if there are any further adjustments needed or if additional information is required.
